nodes.text: Lenan Organa was a Human female Alderaanian who was a general of House of Organa army during the Cold War. When the Alderaan Civil War broke out between various royal noble houses she was put in charge of the war camp tasked with protection of Panteer Refuge, where Princess Katei Elinari Panteer - the closest to an heir to the assassinated queen - were hiding. The general also led the forces fighting against House Ulgo soldiers deployed at the ruins of the Castle Panteer which was occupied by the self-proclaimed King Bouris Ulgo.
